attributes.action: Lobby UN for sanctions against Chinese government for their treatment of Uighurs
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst encouraging unity for a greater China is admirable, these actions are not and are erasing the culture, history and destroying lives of Uighurs. 
As a founder member of UN, it's our responsibility to lobby for decisive yet peaceful action against members who perform significant inhumane acts. 

References - search Uighurs on Reuters and Guardian for more information. E.g:
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2019/may/07/revealed-new-evidence-of-chinas-mission-to-raze-the-mosques-of-xinjiang
attributes.background: Recently, the Chinese government has been integrating the Uighur population in China by mass surveillance, re-education camps, destruction of mosques and deeming acts of worship like observing Ramadan as extremism.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234849
